name: Bombard
overview: A madman equipped with a huge supply of explosives is perched atop a local high-rise and he's bombing the street below. With only a bucket of water to catch and defuse the bombs, you are the only one who can save the block from sure destruction. Position the bucket under each bomb and catch it before it hits the ground. With every level the bomber becomes more proficient; he lights and drops more bombs each level and he drops them faster. When the bomb hits the ground, all the other bombs on screen explode while the bomber giggles in delight Published in RUN 1992/11-12.
